hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how Avifkit keeps your files 100% private.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Avifkit ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our image conversion services at avifkit.com.
introduction.principle_content: Avifkit processes all images locally in your browser. Your files are never uploaded to our servers and never leave your device.

client_side.title: 1. Client-Side Processing
client_side.intro: Unlike traditional online conversion tools, Avifkit uses client-side technology:
items: All image conversions happen directly in your web browser using JavaScript and Canvas API
Images are processed in your device's memory and never transmitted over the internet
Converted files are generated locally and downloaded directly from your browser
We have no access to, cannot view, and do not store any of your uploaded images

info_collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
info_collect.analytics_intro: We may collect anonymous usage analytics to improve our service, including:
info_collect.technical_content: Standard web server logs may include IP addresses, browser user agents, and access times. This data is used solely for security and performance monitoring.

not_collect.title: 3. What We DON'T Collect
items: ‚ùå Your uploaded images or files
‚ùå File names or metadata
‚ùå Personal identification information (names, emails, etc.)
‚ùå Payment information (our service is 100% free)

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Local Storage
items: Essential Cookies: For basic site functionality and language preferences
Analytics Cookies: To understand how visitors use our site (anonymous)
Local Storage: To save your conversion settings (quality, format preferences) locally in your browser
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

third_party.title: 5. Third-Party Services
third_party.intro: We may use third-party services for:
items: Analytics: Google Analytics or similar tools (anonymized)
Hosting: Cloud hosting providers for our website code
CDN: Content delivery networks for faster page loads
third_party.note: These services do NOT have access to your uploaded images, as processing happens entirely in your browser.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: Since we don't collect or store your images, there's no risk of data breaches related to your files. Our website uses HTTPS encryption to protect your connection. All processing happens locally, providing the highest level of security for your sensitive images.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have rights including:
items: Right to access any personal data we may hold
Right to request deletion of your data
Right to opt-out of analytics tracking
Right to data portability

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is safe for all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal information from anyone, including children under 13.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.
